<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simpleremoteepctransport/#ae79c453de0005263fa402a4528daca62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simpleremoteepctransport/#ae79c453de0005263fa402a4528daca62">start</a>() = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Send a SimpleRemoteEPC message.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Trigger disconnection from the transport. The implementation should</span></CodeLine>
